DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial investigate bioequivalence ( expect biological equivalence two pharmaceutical drug product identical active ingredient ) Norditropin速 ( somatropin ) versus Genotropin速 ( somatropin ) healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigate Bioequivalence Norditropin速 ( Somatropin ) Versus Genotropin速 ( Somatropin ) Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject trial entry previous exposure recombinant human growth hormone IGFI ( insulinlike growth factorI ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.027.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Considered generally healthy upon completion medical history , physical examination , vital sign , screen laboratory result , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , judge investigator The receipt investigational medicinal product within 1 month prior trial Current previous treatment growth hormone IGFI Female childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method ( adequate contraceptive measure require local law practice ) duration trial Known presence history malignancy Diabetes mellitus Use systemic corticosteroid Use anabolic steroid History drug alcohol abuse
